text.0: when beauties strive for him as for a charger then strive the songs like soldiers for the sunlight.
text.1: acting the sage he flows enrobed in waters and song as twere a stall that kine may prosper.
text.2: the worlds expand to hirn who from aforetime found light to spread the law of life eternal.
text.3: the swelling songs like kine within the stable in deep devotion call aloud on indu.
text.4: when the sage bears his holy wisdom round him like a car visiting all worlds the hero.
text.5: becoming fame mid gods unto the mortal wealth to the skilled worth praise mid the everpresent.
text.6: for glory born be hath come forth to glory he giveth life and glory to the singers.
text.7: they clothed in glory have become immortal he measured in his course makes frays successful.
